amendment.description: An amendment numbered 5, printed in Part D of House Report 117-366 to allow non-profit organizations to be eligible to receive competitive grant funds through the Wildlife Conservation and Restoration Subaccount.
amendment.purpose: Amendment allows non-profit organizations to be eligible to receive competitive grant funds through the Wildlife Conservation and Restoration Subaccount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Butterfield amendment (A005) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 216 - 206 (Roll no. 265).

action.text: The previous question was ordered on the amendment (A005) pursuant to the rule.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A005) offered by Mr. Butterfield.
Amendment agreed to by House: On agreeing to the Butterfield amendment (A005) Agreed to by the Yeas and Nays: 216 - 206 (Roll no. 265).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
